lines.text: Wait a minute, don't you see? We've won!
Married life is lots of fun / Two can sleep as cheap as one
[Union leaders try to think of ways to disrupt the pajama factory]
How about if the packers put the size large bottoms with the size small tops?
Sure. Now, that's what I mean. That's constructive.
[Offstage, Vernon Hines, wildly jealous, throws knives at Gladys Hotchkiss. Myron Hasler, head of the pajama factory, thinks the knives are intended for him]
It's a plot to murder me... That's the work of foreigners.
